text: Sāūl ne ilzām lagā kar kahā, “Āp ne Yassī ke beṭe Dāūd ke sāth mere ḳhilāf sāzisheṅ kyoṅ kī haiṅ? Batāeṅ, āp ne use roṭī aur talwār kyoṅ dī? Āp ne Allāh se dariyāft kyoṅ kiyā ki Dāūd āge kyā kare? Āp hī kī madad se wuh sarkash ho kar merī tāk meṅ baiṭh gayā hai, kyoṅki āj to aisā hī ho rahā hai.”
